title: Little Man
description: There is a little man on the rim of everyone's beverages. Before any player drinks, they must remove him. Afterwards, they must put him back. Any player that forgets their little man must drink again.

title: Viking Captain
description: You are the captain of a Viking ship and everyone else is your loyal crew. At any point during the game, command your crew to paddle by placing your fists to your head with index fingers extended as horns. All other players must then begin paddling. The last Viking to join in must drink.

title: Dancing Queens
description: Tonight, we dance. Before any player drinks, they must perform a celebratory dance. Failure to dance before drinking results in drinking again.

title: The Majestic Plural
description: All players must speak in the Majestic Plural for the remainder of the game. For example, if you need a refill you would say We need a refill rather than I need a refill. Those who fail to speak without such elegance are condemned to drink.

title: Thumb Master
description: At any point during the game, place your thumb on the playing surface, being as discrete or conspicuous as you like. All other players must then race to do the same. The loser must drink.

title: Ke$ha
description: I'm talking about everybody getting crunk, crunk. Boys trying to touch my junk, junk. After a player is done speaking, they must repeat their last word once more. Any player who fails to speak in the Ke$ha fashion must drink drink.

title: Pterodactyl
description: A tribute to the dinosaur that never truly had its moment in Jurassic Park. At any point during the game, begin screeching and waving your arms. All other players must then race to do the same. The loser must drink.

title: Choo Choo
description: All aboard! While any player laughs, they must also be pumping both arms in the air in a choo choo fashion. Any player who laughs without choo chooing is sentenced to a drink.

title: Neanderthals
description: In case the night hasn’t devolved to this point already, all players may speak only in sentences of three words or less. Any player who exceeds that limit must drink.

title: Psychics
description: Finally, you can passive aggressively call out that person who claims to be psychic.  After a player draws a card, they must predict the card's suit before turning it over. There’s a drink in the immediate future for any player who makes a wrongful prediction.

title: Forehead Master
description: The meaner, grouchier, older brother of the Thumb Master. At any point during the game, place your forehead onto the playing surface. All other players must race to do the same. The loser must drink.

title: Incognito
description: Each player makes up a new name for the player to their left, which then becomes that player's name. Any player who uses another player’s real name must drink.

title: T-Rex Arms
description: While a player is drinking, their elbows must be locked to their side. Failure to imitate t-rex arms results in a second drink.

title: I'll Tell You What
description: As a great way to sound confident with whatever bullshit you’re about to say, all players must incorporate the phrase I'll tell you what into whatever they say. Any player that doesn’t tell you what must drink.

title: Robert Paulson
description: Perhaps the most memorable of all the Fight Club characters, all players are now named Robert Paulson. Any player who uses another player’s real name must drink.

title: Non-Staring Contest
description: If any two players make eye contact, both must drink.

title: High Fives All Around
description: Got that itch on your hand for some high fivin’? Good. Any two players who make eye contact must promptly high five. A failure to slap some skin means both players drink.

title: The Minister of Foreign Affairs
description: Only you may communicate with anyone outside of the game. In the event another player needs to communicate with an outsider, they may ask you to speak in their honor. Any player who defies your authority must drink.

title: I'm Not Wearing Hockey Pads
description: All players must use Christian Bale's Batman voice while speaking. Any player who speaks without imitating the Dark Knight must drink.

title: Ambidextrous
description: Being able to drink efficiently with either hand is an essential skill, so all players must drink using their non-dominant hand. Any player who fails to work on that other arm’s coordination must drink.

title: The Royals
description: And we'll never be royals (royals). It don't run in our blood. All players must place a bottle cap on their head, which will serve as their crown. If a crown falls, the player drinks.

title: Toast
description: I don't know half of you half as well as I should like; and I like less than half of you half as well as you deserve. All players must make a toast before they drink. Any player that drinks without toasting must drink once more.

title: Dude, Bro, Like and Homie
description: The words dude, bro, like and homie are now banned. Any player that uses one must drink.

title: Tough Love
description: Life ain't easy, and it's time you all heard heard the ugly truth about one another. Before any player drinks, they must insult another player. Any player who drinks without dishing it out first must drink again.

title: The Three D’s
description: The words drink, drank and drunk are now banned. Any player caught using one must, uh, enjoy a hearty sip of their beverage.

title: The Startups
description: Since there’s never a bad time to work on that startup idea, all players must say dot com after speaking. Any player that speaks without completing their domain name must drink.

title: Pirates
description: All players are now pirates and must speak like one. Any player that fails to talk like a pirate is a filthy codfish and must walk the plank. Or drink.

title: Impersonators
description: Each player picks a celebrity and must take on either their persona or the persona of someone they’ve played. Any player caught acting out of character must drink.

title: A Date For All
description: No more lonely souls, because you get to pick another player to be everyone's date. Anytime any player has to drink so does that lucky player.

title: The Great Time Travelers
description: After any player drinks, they must drink once more.

title: The Accusation
description: Pointing is now prohibited. Any player whose finger points must finish their drink.

title: Family Reunion
description: The night’s quota on swear words has been exceeded, you assholes. Any form of swearing is now banned. Any player who swears must drink.

title: Dirty Beverage
description: Look at how sexy your drink is. Now talk a little dirty to it. All players must do that every time before taking a drink. Any prudes must drink twice.

title: The Chairman
description: Before any player can leave the playing area, including just to go to the restroom, they must first request your permission. Any player who defies your authority must drink.

title: The Smirks
description: Showing teeth while laughing is now prohibited. Flashing those pearly whites while laughing results in that player taking a drink.

title: Nature Calls
description: After a player drinks, they must make their finest animal noise. For example, moo. Any player that forgets their call to nature must drink.

title: Covert Operation
description: Every player must say over and out after speaking. Any player who fails to end their transmission according to protocol must drink.

title: Together Forever
description: Phone usage is now prohibited. Any player caught using their phone must hand it over to the other players and allow a single text message to be sent to any contact they choose. As a courtesy, the player may choose 5 contacts that are off limits to this rule.

title: Sasquatch
description: Female players are now banned from touching the hair on their heads and male players are banned from touching the hair on their face. Any hair touchers must drink.

title: Wink Master
description: In addition to getting creeped out, if another player sees you wink at them at any point during the game that player must drink.

title: The Prophecy
description: After a player is finished speaking, they must say a fake chapter and verse as if it were from the Bible. For example, Turn the music up! Party 2:18. Any player who forgets thou holiness must drink.

title: Falsetto
description: All players must speak only in falsetto. Any player who falsett-no’s must drink.

title: The Yodeling
description: Begin yodeling at any point during the game and all other players must applaud. The last player to join in must drink.

title: Dictator
description: With great power, comes careless impulsive abuse of it. Keep those words in mind as you lick a card and stick it to your forehead. As long as that card is stuck to your head, you may absolish and create any number of rules you want. However, once the card falls, the rules are reverted back to how they were before you drew it.

title: The Shunned
description: Pick another player to be shunned. If any player acknowledges that person, whether by speaking to them or even looking at them, that player must finish their drink and is shunned instead of the former player.

title: The Floor Is Lava
description: Touching the floor is now banned. Any player who touches the floor must drink.

title: Pinkies Out
description: When in doubt, pinky out. All players must keep a pinky visibly extended. Any players who fail to keep that pinky outstretched must drink.

title: Manners
description: Before any player tells another player to drink, they must look lovingly into their eyes, provide a compliment and politely ask them to drink. Any impolite players must drink instead of the player they chose.

title: The MC
description: I'm a menace; a dentist; an oral hygienist. While a player is speaking, they must rhyme with themselves at least once. Any player who fails to rhyme, takes a drink every time.

title: Kamikaze
description: At any point during the game, tell another player to drink. That player must drink, but as a noble sacrifice, you must drink with them.

title: Mathematician
description: Numbers are now banned. Any player who says a number, or even thinks of one, must drink that number of times.

title: The Name of Thrones
description: All players must be referred to in terms of royalty - King Dave, Queen Jenny, Prince Ass, Princess Ass, etc. Any player who refers to another player without their proper title must drink.

title: Fire in the Hole
description: At any point during the game, shout Fire in the Hole! All other players must then duck for cover. The last player to duck must drink.

title: Measuring Cup
description: Get a 1/4 measuring cup, and pick the player you suspect is not drinking enough per sip. That player must now use the measuring cup every time they drink.

title: Gratitude
description: After any player drinks, they must thank you. Any player who drinks without showing you some appreciation must drink again.
